channel.title: Hey (PI) Need help fixing pk points when you kill somebody
channel.description:
Hey im not a noob coder, before you all thing this. My server is fuly coded exept this problem, When you kill somebody in wildy it comes up with something along the lines of, You do not recive pk points because you have killed this person more than twice.
Even though i havent, So if anybody could look into this for me and maybe fix id be verry greatfull.
PM me or add my msn at luke_josh_ashworth@hotmail.co.uk
Thanks Luke.
